analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xfa19cafa20400e449877140e05d01060f1b6bc4b.sol:
	Contract TradeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa19cafa20400e449877140e05d01060f1b6bc4b.sol#214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xfa19cafa20400e449877140e05d01060f1b6bc4b.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
